nodeFlavour.name: Mine
nodeFlavour.flavour: There is a great mine located on the island.

nodeFlavour.name: Quarry
nodeFlavour.flavour: You spot a well built quarry.

nodeFlavour.name: Wreckage
nodeFlavour.flavour: This seems to be a wreckage of some sort.

nodeFlavour.name: Factory
nodeFlavour.flavour: An old factory. You are not quite sure what it was used for.

nodeFlavour.name: Village
nodeFlavour.flavour: There is a small village here.

nodeFlavour.name: Forest
nodeFlavour.flavour: A large forest spanning a huge area.

nodeFlavour.name: Rock Formation
nodeFlavour.flavour: There are a formation of floating rocks.

nodeFlavour.name: Magic Site
nodeFlavour.flavour: Some sort of ritualistic site for use of magic.

nodeFlavour.name: Lake
nodeFlavour.flavour: There is a vast lake with a glimmering surface here.
